about: As a dedicated B.Tech student, I am seeking an entry-level opportunity where I can apply my skills & enhance learning in the field of work. why_me: I bring a strong foundation in problem-solving and communication, coupled with hands-on experience in developing innovative web and mobile applications. My ability to learn quickly and adapt to new tools makes me a valuable team player ready to tackle complex challenges.
